name: Dervin Dodger
description:
|ABOUT|

Help Dervin Dodger navigate his ship through the never ending onslaught of asteroids. With only the help of a few missiles you must use quick thinking and fast reflexes to maneuver the tricky asteroid field.

|HOW TO PLAY|

Use your mouse to maneuver around the obstacles 

Left click to shoot your missiles for when you're in a jam

Look out for little pink boxes. They will replenish your missiles.

Have fun
